command:
#!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby -wKU

def tab
	ENV['TM_SOFT_TABS'] == 'YES' ? ' ' * ENV['TM_TAB_SIZE'].to_i : "\t"
end

code = STDIN.read

if code =~ /\A\s*\{\s*\n(.*\n)\s*\}\s*\z/m then
  STDOUT << $1.gsub(/^#{tab}/, '')
else
  STDOUT << '}'
end
name: Unwrap Braces
